channel.title: Easy Client Downloader
channel.description:
[center][b][size=14pt]If this is in the wrong section or isn't allowed please lock, move, or remove this topic.[/size][/b][/center]
[center]The soul purpose of this application is to make downloading a client easier.[/center]
[center]The howto: Of course open the app. Click Create and create a account. Login. Heres how the settings work. The Download address is the address at which the file is to be downloaded. (Duh) The server name is the name of your server Client version basically means is it a 317? A 508? By is the owners name. And File Extention means what goes on the end which is needed because it can't figure it out on its own.
[IMG]http://i819.photobucket.com/albums/zz118/ancient8989/Main.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i819.photobucket.com/albums/zz118/ancient8989/Settings.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i819.photobucket.com/albums/zz118/ancient8989/OtherSettings.jpg[/img]
[b][size=10pt]This currently only works for Windows XP.[/size][/b]
Dowload link removed due to lack of testing.
To test it you can use this!
http://www.google.com/logos/newyears10.gif
just put that into the address bar and change the File Ext to .gif
Created by Me!
By the way the best thing to do is put it on your website but have them hit run instead of save so it runs and downloads!
[size=12pt][b]If you are having trouble downloading your file then upload it on uppit. It seems to be having issues, v1.1 will be comming out soon and will support Windows7/Vista. I have other code and will take a look. - Thanks[/b][/size][/center]

item.title: Easy Client Downloader
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Arc Mod Arc
item.description:
@Mod_Arc wrote:

[center][size=14pt]If this is in the wrong section or isn’t allowed please lock, move, or remove this topic.[/size][/center]

[center]The soul purpose of this application is to make downloading a client easier.[/center]

[center]The howto:
Of course open the app.
Click Create and create a account.
Login.
Heres how the settings work.
The Download address is the address at which the file is to be downloaded. (Duh)
The server name is the name of your server
Client version basically means is it a 317? A 508?
By is the owners name.
And File Extention means what goes on the end which is needed because it can’t figure it out on its own.

[size=10pt]This currently only works for Windows XP.[/size]

Dowload link removed due to lack of testing.

To test it you can use this!

just put that into the address bar and change the File Ext to .gif

Created by Me!

By the way the best thing to do is put it on your website but have them hit run instead of save so it runs and downloads!

[size=12pt]If you are having trouble downloading your file then upload it on uppit. It seems to be having issues, v1.1 will be comming out soon and will support Windows7/Vista. I have other code and will take a look. - Thanks[/size][/center]
